mapper.select: SELECT ADMIN_ID, MEM_TYPE_ID, ADMIN_AUTHORITY_ID, ADMIN_EMAIL, ADMIN_PW,ADMIN_REG_DATE FROM ( SELECT SEQ, ADMIN_ID, MEM_TYPE_ID, ADMIN_AUTHORITY_ID, ADMIN_EMAIL, ADMIN_PW,ADMIN_REG_DATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS SEQ, ADMIN_ID, MEM_TYPE_ID, ADMIN_AUTHORITY_ID, ADMIN_EMAIL, ADMIN_PW,ADMIN_REG_DATE FROM ( SELECT ADMIN_ID, MEM_TYPE_ID, ADMIN_AUTHORITY_ID, ADMIN_EMAIL, ADMIN_PW,TO_CHAR(ADMIN_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ADMIN_REG_DATE, FROM ADMIN ORDER BY ADMIN_ID) ) WHERE seq >= #{startPostNo} ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endPostNo}
SELECT ADMIN_ID, MEM_TYPE_ID, ADMIN_AUTHORITY_ID, ADMIN_EMAIL, ADMIN_PW,TO_CHAR(ADMIN_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ADMIN_REG_DATE, FROM ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_ID=#{adminId})

SELECT ADMIN_ID, MEM_TYPE_ID, ADMIN_AUTHORITY_ID, ADMIN_EMAIL, ADMIN_PW,ADMIN_REG_DATE FROM(SELECT SEQ, ADMIN_ID, MEM_TYPE_ID, ADMIN_AUTHORITY_ID, ADMIN_EMAIL, ADMIN_PW,ADMIN_REG_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS SEQ, ADMIN_ID, MEM_TYPE_ID, ADMIN_AUTHORITY_ID, ADMIN_EMAIL, ADMIN_PW,ADMIN_REG_DATE FROM (SELECT ADMIN_ID, MEM_TYPE_ID, ADMIN_AUTHORITY_ID, ADMIN_EMAIL, ADMIN_PW,TO_CHAR(ADMIN_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ADMIN_REG_DATE, FROM ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_REG_DATE BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{searchDTO.startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.xff') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{searchDTO.endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.xff') ORDER BY ADMIN_ID) ) WHERE seq >= #{startPostNo} ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endPostNo}
